creator: mburchard@emos.de
text:
The Bug occurs if you try to render a table that doesn't fit on one page but 
only because the footer of the table doesn't fit.

For example you create a table with x rows.
That table (header, body and footer) fits correct on one page, everything works 
fine.
If you try the same with x+1 rows you get into a loop with that errormessage.
if you try it now with x+2 rows everything works fine.

Created attachment 1188
The XSL-File for creation
